title: Infantino Lil' Nibbles Textured Silicone Teether -Sensory Exploration and Teething Relief with Easy to Hold Handles, Orange Carrot
description: The Infantino BPA-Free silicone carrot teether is perfect for soothing tender gums and providing teething relief. Easy-to-hold handles make this teether irresistible for tiny hands. Interesting textures awaken your baby's mouthing senses, encouraging them to move their tongue and jaw in new and interesting ways. These motions help your baby build muscles for eating solids, sound production, and speech development. Surface clean only. Clean teether before each use with a damp sponge or cloth.
